description: How many of Stuart Broad's 234 Test victims can you name?
title: Stuart Broad quiz: How many of England bowler's Test victims can you name?
title_page: Stuart Broad quiz: How many of England bowler's Test victims can you name? - BBC Sport
maintext:
Stuart Broad has retired from cricket after taking the final two Australia wickets in the fifth Ashes Test at The Oval to earn England a series draw.
The 37-year-old became just the fifth player to reach 600 Test wickets - and the second England bowler and pacer behind team-mate James Anderson - during the fourth Ashes Test at Old Trafford.
We want to know how many of Broad's Test victims you can name.
There are 234 different batters to recall so we've given hints which will help you in some cases and probably won't in others.
You've got 50 minutes, so get yourself - and maybe a mate - ready and dive in!
